/usr/bin/clang++-3.8   -Wno-c++11-narrowing -std=c++11 -g -Wall  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/PROGRAM.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o PROGRAM  -L/home/natan/Documents/Island_Life/island-life-game/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/natan/Documents/Island_Life/island-life-game/lib -lglfw -lX11 -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -ldl -lpthread -lGLEW -lSOIL -lassimp -lfreetype
